data.name: Flexi First Option Home Loan - Veterans
data.description: A low variable rate loan to support eligible ?Veterans? with purchasing, constructing or refinancing a home, for owner occupied purposed only.

features.additionalInfo: This loan can be used for purchase of an owner-occupied property, home construction (Contract Builders only), renovation / home improvements and debt consolidation
The product provides options which includes portability, redraw, repayment holiday, top-up, progress draw, parental leave

Capped Rate Option : If you are under the capped rate option, the annual percentage rate for any day during an agreed period (called the 'capped rate period') is the lower of: a) our standard variable rate on that day for loans in the same loan category as yours; and b) the annual percentage rate cap shown in the Offer.

Substituting a security : You may ask us to accept a new mortgage over other land as a substitute for any mortgage which is security for your loan. We may agree to this if you satisfy any reasonable requirements that we have, such as repaying part of the loan amount. We will require the new mortgage to be provided at the same time that the existing mortgage is discharged. We charge a fee for substituting a mortgage or other security.
Statements of account : We will send you a statement of your loan account at least every six months or more frequently if you request
The product includes fraud protection features.
Subject to terms and conditions, this product includes guarantor features.

constraints.additionalInfo: Loan amount as stated on the Certificate of Entitlement to a maximum of $25,000.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Applicant must have served in the Defence Force either prior to May 1985 or allotted for service in Namibia between 1989 and 1990.
Applicant must be eligible as per Department of Veterans' Affairs and is confirmed by the issue of a Certificate of Entitlement or Or Certificate of Assignment
